actions.text: House Committee on Education and Labor Discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A resolution to urge negotiators for major league baseball owners and players to quickly settle their differences and avoid a scheduled players' strike.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the Major League Baseball Players Association and team owners have a responsibility to ensure that the current baseball season is not interrupted, and that both parties should do everything in their power to avoid a strike.

titles.title: A resolution to urge negotiators for major league baseball owners and players to quickly settle their differences and avoid a scheduled players' strike.
